title: LRPC - vertical at natural rate of unemployment

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the long-run Phillips curve?

choices.label: It shows there is a trade-off between unemployment and inflation.
It is positively sloped when the inflation rate exceeds the unemployment rate.
It is vertical at the natural rate of unemployment.
It shifts to the right if aggregate demand increases.
It is created by an adverse supply shock.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
